Subject: RIP Jasper
Paragraphs:
Dear Alice,

I am writing to report a recent incident that has left me quite upset. Last week during the meeting, Tom made several unprofessional remarks towards me and my team. I feel that this kind of behavior is unacceptable in the workplace and I would like to request that you take appropriate action to address this issue.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Best regards,
Cindy
